content: Yes, I believe that the use of AR technology by retailers is likely to become even more popular in the future. This is because AR technology has the potential to greatly enhance the customer experience by providing a more immersive and engaging shopping experience. In addition, AR technology can also help to address some of the challenges faced by traditional brick-and-mortar retailers, such as the need to compete with online retailers and the increasing demand for personalized shopping experiences. As the technology continues to improve and become more accessible, it is likely that we will see more retailers adopt AR technology in order to stay competitive and provide their customers with a more innovative shopping experience.
